DOC.brief_summary: Primary: - To compare the efficacy and safety of Insulin Glulisine to Insulin Lispro in subjects with type 1 or type 2 diabetes mellitus. - To compare the frequency of hypoglycemia of Insulin Glulisine to Insulin Lispro. Secondary: - To compare Insulin Glulisine to Insulin Lispro in terms of the change in HbA1c at weeks 12, blood glucose parameters, insulin doses and treatment satisfaction in subjects with type 1 or type 2 diabetes mellitus
DOC.brief_title: Insulin Glulisine, Insulin Lispro and Insulin Glargine in Type 1 or 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Type 1 or type 2 diabetic patients Measure HbA1c 6.5% to 11.0% at visit 1 More than 3 months of continuous insulin treatment immediately prior to study entry Pregnant women The above information is not intended to contain all considerations relevant to a patient's potential participation in a clinical trial.
